title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Added push protection for GitHub MCP server interactions to block secrets in AI responses and actions (public repositories only).
Created a new guide for resolving push protection blocks with the GitHub MCP server.
Standardized all Copilot documentation titles and filenames to use "GitHub Copilot".
Clarified billing continues for removed seats until the current cycle ends.
summary:
- Added push protection for GitHub MCP server interactions to block secrets in AI responses and actions (public repositories only).
- Created a new guide for resolving push protection blocks with the GitHub MCP server.
- Standardized all Copilot documentation titles and filenames to use "GitHub Copilot".
- Clarified billing continues for removed seats until the current cycle ends.
generated_title: Integrate push protection with GitHub MCP server and standardize Copilot docs
commits: **bb4dc57**: [Improvement]: Standardize all Copilot article titles and filenames to use 'GitHub Copilot' (#57087) (by Sophie)
**1211c2e**: Secret scanning push protection integration with MCP Remote Server #19052 (#57020) (by Anne-Marie)
**f8e1d6d**: Update Copilot billing cycle details for seat management documentation (#57002) (by Eboni)
original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:

- Created a new guide for resolving push protection blocks with the GitHub MCP server.
- Standardized all Copilot documentation titles and filenames to use "GitHub Copilot".
- Clarified billing continues for removed seats until the current cycle ends.
